I have yet to try a crepe I haven't liked here. ANDDD they have an extensive list of them... They have basic crepes with a couple ingredients, to some more interesting concoctions--a teeny bit more in price, but huge portions and more ingredients. I love their savoury crepes--I haven't been able to find a better savoury crepe yet. Their sweet crepes are great, too, but I haven't had them as often because I am usually far too full from a couple of savoury ones (my husband and I can do with two--but sometimes we'll get a third to split).Drinks-wise, I cannnnnot get over how good their mojito is.Late at night, especially on weekends, it can get a bit loud and raucous--but that can be quite fun, so long as you know what you're getting into!
